commit.message:
Add addresses of DIEs to debug_dwarf_die

gcc/
	* dwarf2out.c (print_die): Print the address of the current DIE or
	of any DIE referenced by the current one.

From-SVN: r167247

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,8 @@
+2010-11-29  Dodji Seketeli  <dodji@redhat.com>
+
+	* dwarf2out.c (print_die): Print the address of the current DIE or
+	of any DIE referenced by the current one.
+
 2010-11-29  Dodji Seketeli  <dodji@redhat.com>
 
 	PR debug/46101
